title: A Nurse's Revenge
overview: Haunted by a deadly accident that claims the life of the child she anonymously gave up for adoption, grieving nurse Sharon cunningly infiltrates the life of survivor Cassie to become her caretaker, orchestrating a sadistic vengeful scheme against the negligent teens responsible for the tragedy. As the other survivors slowly perish around her, Cassie unravels Sharonâ€™s secret connection to the deceased as well as her sinister intentions.
